Quick Spectrogram Annotations
=============================

Overview
--------

Quick Spectrogram Annotations are an extension that builds upon the more basic [Spectrogram Annotations](../../spectrogramannotations/docs/spectrogramannotations.html) and allow the user to make marks on the [spectrogram display]( spectrogramdisplayhelp=) and add a small amount of text to go with each mark.

They can be used either in [real time](../../../overview/PamMasterHelp/docs/normalMode.html) or offline using the [PAMGuard viewer](../../../overview/PamMasterHelp/docs/viewerMode.html)

Data from the marks are stored in the [PAMGuard Database](../../generalDatabaseHelp/docs/database_database.html).
